mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(ma.maker_idx, 0) AS maker_idx, IFNULL(r.reward_idx, 0) AS reward_idx, IFNULL(p.project_idx, 0) AS project_idx FROM maker ma LEFT JOIN members m ON m.member_idx = ma.member_idx LEFT JOIN project p ON ma.maker_idx = p.maker_idx AND p.project_approve_status = 1 LEFT JOIN reward r ON p.project_idx = r.project_idx WHERE m.member_id = #{sId}

SELECT maker_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fallowing WHERE maker_idx = f.maker_idx) AS follower_count, MAX(is_alam) AS is_alam, f.maker_idx FROM fallowing f join maker k on f.maker_idx = k.maker_idx WHERE f.member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM members WHERE member_id = #{sId}) GROUP BY k.maker_idx;
mapper.update: UPDATE fallowing SET is_alam = #{is_alam} WHERE member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM members WHERE member_id = #{sId}) AND maker_idx = (SELECT maker_idx FROM maker WHERE maker_name = #{maker_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fallowing WHERE member_idx = (SELECT member_idx FROM members WHERE member_id = #{sId}) AND maker_idx = (SELECT maker_idx FROM maker WHERE maker_name = #{maker_name})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fallowing VALUES ((SELECT member_idx FROM members WHERE member_id = #{sId}) ,(SELECT maker_idx FROM maker WHERE maker_name = #{maker_name}) , 1)
